name: Poseidon, the Great Emperor God of Oceans
text:
Continuous: At the end of turn, destroy all resonators in your field that are not named "Poseidon, the Great Emperor God of Oceans", then discard two card from your hand. Activate. Banish four cards in your lifebreak area: Return all resonators in your opponent's field to the bottom of his or her main deck. Activate. Pay
3
